episodes.title: Summer camp leader jailed for drugging and sexually abusing boys | ITV News Central (East)
episodes.description:
The latest news, sport and weather from the ITV News Central team. On today’s programme:

-  A summer camp leader from Nottinghamshire who injected sedatives into sweets to sexually abuse boys is jailed for more than 23 years 

A church goer, Ruben was accused of using the 'Cloak of Christianity' to offend - police now investigate what else happened in the 27 years he ran the camp 

-  The funeral of a mother and daughter from Nottinghamshire who died off the East Yorkshire coast has been held today.

Hearses carried the coffins of Sarah Keeling and her 15 year old daughter Grace to a private service for family and friends in Mansfield. Grace was swept away in the sea in Withernsea on the 2nd of January.

- The opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics will soon get underway in the northern Italian city of Milan. We take a look at the local talent.

- The opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics will soon get underway in the northern Italian city of Milan. We take a look at the local talent.
